join condition: value_as_string inselect concept_code from vocabulary.concept where invalid_reason is null and concept_class_id = 'MS-DRG' and vocabulary_id='DRG'
case when visit_start_date<'2007-10-01' then '01' else '02' end as drg_type
left join dcc_pedsnet.location l on c.location_id = l.location_id
